title: Pincurchin

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Spark!** - Redirect a player. (3 uses)
**Discharge!** - Upgrade your Defense to Basic and Attack to Powerful tonight. (1 use)
**Electric Terrain!** - Upgrade your Defense to Basic tonight. Redirect all players who don't visit tonight to you. If they don't have a visiting ability, the visit will do nothing. This cannot be used before Night 3. (1 use)

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: **Lightning Rod** - You will attack players who visit you.

desc:
Post 1276
*It likes rolling, but is unable to do so because of its spines.*
